XMLDB.COMMENT: XMLDB file for common Data Hub version 1 logs and scheduling

TABLE.NAME: local_datahub_summary_logs
TABLE.COMMENT: Storage for per-run errors and statistics

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: Tracks whether the task was an import or an export

FIELD.NAME: plugin
FIELD.COMMENT: Shortname of the plugin being run

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the user running the task

FIELD.NAME: targetstarttime
FIELD.COMMENT: The ideal scheduled start time

FIELD.NAME: starttime
FIELD.COMMENT: The actual start time

FIELD.NAME: endtime
FIELD.COMMENT: The actual end time

FIELD.NAME: filesuccesses
FIELD.COMMENT: The number of successful rows processed directly from an import file

FIELD.NAME: filefailures
FIELD.COMMENT: The number of rows that failed to be processed directly from an import file

FIELD.NAME: storedsuccesses
FIELD.COMMENT: The number of successful rows processed from previously stored records

FIELD.NAME: storedfailures
FIELD.COMMENT: The number of rows that failed to be processed from previously stored records

FIELD.NAME: statusmessage
FIELD.COMMENT: Success / failure status message

FIELD.NAME: dbops
FIELD.COMMENT: The number of database operations used

FIELD.NAME: unmetdependency
FIELD.COMMENT: Flag to indicate that the record failed due to an unmet dependency

FIELD.NAME: logpath
FIELD.COMMENT: Path to the log file for download

FIELD.NAME: entitytype
FIELD.COMMENT: The entity type imported

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: schedule owner

FIELD.NAME: plugin
FIELD.COMMENT: The DH plugin type

FIELD.NAME: config
FIELD.COMMENT: Serialized configuration for the scheduled task

FIELD.NAME: lastruntime
FIELD.COMMENT: Mirror of elis scheduled task last runtime

FIELD.NAME: nextruntime
FIELD.COMMENT: Mirror of elis scheduled task next runtime
